name: Lock Shot
description: This is Lock Shot where you have to shoot locks by heating or cooling a bullet to unlock them, a lock will fall on a table and directly when it hits the table you have 5 seconds to heat or cool the bullet by using the F (Heat) or C (Cool) key to get the bullet to the right temperature if it's not the right temperature and you shoot the lock you will lose, see how many points you can get and remember, Temperature is key
